Key Match Events: Sri Lanka took the final eight runs in just three deliveries
Ebadot Hossain leaked 17 runs in the 19th over
Post-Match Reflections: Shakib Al Hasan pointed to the team’s poor bowling at the death overs as the main reason behind their defeat
Shakib said that he felt bad for the Bangladesh supporters and hopes to give something back to them in the future
The last six months we haven’t played well, but we have been competitive in these last two games.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bangladesh fans watching the Asia Cup match between Bangladesh and Sri Lanka at the Dubai International Cricket Stadium
Thousands of Bangladesh fans were at the stands, cheering their team in both games
Others: Bangladesh are out of this year’s Asia Cup after suffering a two-wicket defeat in their do-or-die match against Sri Lanka
The World Cup will be a different challenge. We need to work on many areas to do well there.
